title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta with garlic until crispy, then discard garlic.
Beat eggs with cheeses and a pinch of black pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Quickly toss hot pasta with pancetta, then add egg mixture, stirring to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
